about_the_game:
VRSO stands for Virtual Reality Sport Organization. Our vision is to create highest quality sports game based on the physics simulation for the virtual reality.

Locations
The game is set in a world of existing abandoned locations thanks to photogrammetry technology.

Singleplayer
It is based on the concept of a tournament with a backstory, where the player will have to beat 16 players to become the champion of the VRSO league. Each opponent has different skills and fighting style, and thus poses a different level of difficulty.

Cutting edge movement technology
All animations have been created using motion capture technology – in cooperation with professional fighters. As a result, our in-game opponents have all the necessary fighting skills – such as offensive and defensive movement, distraction, dodging, blocks, pivots, fades, attacks, combos.

Traning mode
A lot of emphasis is placed on the training mode, where the player is able to configure their opponent. This is an extremely useful option also for professionals, who will be able to decide how offensive or defensive the opponent is and set all the parameters of the opponent’s other features and behaviors – reflexes, speed, stamina, character and other.

Multiplayer
In addition to the single player campaign, the game features an advanced multiplayer

name: VRSO: Bare Knuckle Fighting

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR / OculusVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 Ti | AMD Radeon R9 Fury X
  • VR Support: SteamVR / OculusVR

short_description: VRSO: Bare Knuckle Fighting set in authentic abandoned arenas. Face off against 16 unique fighters in the pinnacle of VR sports. Hone your skills in detailed training, then challenge players worldwide. Experience cutting-edge movement in every punch and dodge. Become the ultimate VRSO champion!
